entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:49 p.m. EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets mixed with snow near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4.
